name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Soft cubes of paneer cooked in a creamy tomato-based curry with a hint of spice.

name: Margherita Naan Pizza
description: Classic naan pizza topped with mozzarella, fresh tomatoes, and basil.

name: Kachumber Salad
description: A fresh mix of cucumber, tomatoes, and onions, seasoned with chaat masala and lemon juice.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with marinated chicken, spices, and fried onions.

name: Aloo Tikki Burger
description: A spicy aloo tikki served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and mint chutney.

name: Chicken Tikka Wrap
description: Juicy chicken tikka wrapped in a warm naan with onions, cucumber, and mint chutney.

name: Tandoori Platter
description: An assortment of tandoori meats including chicken, lamb, and prawns, served with mint chutney.

name: Indian Thali
description: A traditional thali with roti, rice, dal, sabzi, raita, and a sweet treat.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender pieces of chicken in a creamy and aromatic tomato-based curry, served with naan.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: A wholesome bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, fresh greens, and coconut dressing.

name: Prawn Pulao
description: Flavorful basmati rice cooked with fresh prawns, spices, and herbs.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft, syrupy dough balls soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

name: Masala Dosa
description: A thin, crispy rice crepe filled with spiced mashed potatoes, served with chutney and sambar.

name: Chicken Kathi Rolls
description: Two soft rolls filled with spiced chicken, onions, and chutney.

name: Sizzling Brownie
description: A warm brownie served on a sizzling plate with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Tomato Shorba
description: A spiced tomato soup with aromatic Indian herbs and spices.

name: Mushroom Curry
description: Mushrooms cooked in a creamy, spiced gravy with Indian herbs.

name: Baingan Bharta
description: Smoky mashed eggplant cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

name: Mango Cheesecake
description: Creamy mango-flavored cheesecake on a crumbly base.

name: Paneer Kathi Roll
description: A wrap filled with spiced paneer cubes, fresh veggies, and chutney.
